name: Fertility v6 - Gapminder (2015)
title: Fertility v6 - Gapminder (2015)
description:
This is version 6 that was updated by Gapminder in January 2015.

Projections are mostly from the UN's World Population Prospects: The 2012 Revision.

sources.name: Fertility v6 - Gapminder (2015)
sources.dataPublisherSource: The data set was authored by  Ferenc Ajus and edited by Mattias Lindgren. The long list of original data sources is presented in the documentation.
